messages.author: Station Earnings Report
messages.body:
Sector Economic Report
Sector vendor prices is currently at 500%.
The station spending power is currently 200 Credits, and the crew's targeted allowance is at 40 Credits.
That's all from the Nanotrasen Economist Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Nuclear Self-Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by FUCKMAN SUPREME. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
